text: Lettin' It All Hang Out is the autobiography of drag performer RuPaul. The book was originally released in 1995 in hardback, and then in paperback a year later. Although the book is classed as an autobiography, it is self described as "Part auto-biography, part how-to manual". Aside from RuPaul's life story, the book also contains a chapter on beauty tips. ==References== Category:1995 non-fiction books Category:American autobiographies Category:Works by RuPaul
title: Lettin' It All Hang Out
